Package vgp.tutor.vectorField

Tutorial Project on Vector Fields.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PaVectorField
    Tutorial applet on vector fields on planar grids and curved surfaces.
    PjVectorField
    Tutorial project on vector fields.
    PjVectorField_IP
    Info panel of tutorial project on vector fields.

Package vgp.tutor.vectorField Description

Tutorial Project on Vector Fields. Sample vector field is gradient or rotation of a potential on a square grid. User may interactively modify potential by marking or unmarking vertices.
